document_data.name: Valdemar
document_data.mainbody:
'''Valdemar''' was a [[dragon aging|young]] [[green dragon]] that dwelled inside of [[Wyllowwood]], within the subterranean dungeon complex known as [[Undermountain]], during the 14{{th}} and 15{{th}} centuries [[DR]]. 

While Valdemar was originally used by the druid [[Wyllow]] to ward off [[adventurer]]s that sought their fortune within Undermountain, a life-changing event altered the dragon's perspective and it became a permanent fixture within the ecology of Wyllowwood. After this, the dragon began to refer to itself as '''Tearulai'''.
document_data.History:
When Valdemar was used by Wyllow as a guardian of her domain during the 14{{th}} century,

Sometime prior to the [[1492 DR|Year of the Three Ships Sailing, 1492 DR]],{{Waterdeep-time}} Valdemar was assaulted by an adventurer and was impaled by the [[Intelligent item|intelligent]] [[sword]], ''[[Tearulai]]'', which became embedded within its skull.
